messages.content: I don't think that's directly possible. Forming an Indian company and buying thru the company might be a way. You could also find out thru your channels.

Hi, my name is Govind and I live in Halifax, Canada. I am interested in investing in and around Hyderabad provided I am allowed to invest as a Canadian Citizen. Kindly let me know if there are any possibilities for the same. Thank you.
